title: No Day 1 PS5 Exclusives for PC Gamers - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.19.23
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses.

Sorry, PC gamers, Jim Ryan's got some bad news for you.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:03 - Housekeeping
 - TODAY we’re celebrating Kev and Mike’s b-day with a special a subathon marathon stream.  We’re gonna get in our PJs, build a fort, and go late if you want it! Come join us for some snacks, games, and sleep over vibes!
    - The Roper Report   -
00:10:56 - No PS5 Exclusives Day 1 on PC, Mike Straw @ Insider Gaming
00:29:36 - Zelda: Tears Of The Kingdom Update Now Live (Version 1.1.1), Here Are The Full Patch Notes, Liam Doolan @ Nintento Life
00:35:26 - LEGO DRIVE Review Round-Up
00:37:56 - Lego 2K Drive Cloud And Cross-Platform Saves Temporarily Disabled To Avoid Progression Loss, Steven T Wright @ GameSpot
00:43:06 - Ad
00:44:20 - Super Mario Game Boy Advance Games Are Coming to Nintendo Switch Online, Anthony Wood @ IGN
00:50:25 - Horizon Ain’t Worried About Haters, Demi Williams @ GameSpot
00:53:51 - Boring ass Activision Update - Joshua Fineman @ Seeking Alpha
00:54:21 - Tim talks Sonic
00:56:01 - Out Today
00:57:06 - You‘re Wrong
